page.title: 04A Local Shopping Centre.
page.content: Our local{shopping centre}comprises a chemist with a pharmacy, supermarket, newsagent with a post office, take-away foodshop and a hairdressers. Also there is a dentist, a building society and meeting rooms run by the {Y.M.C.A.}where activities take place in the daytime like playgroups, judo, dancing and lunch clubs. The public house is the Book and Candle. Lots of people use the centre because it is near their homes but many only come to collect pensions or benefits from the post office. Most people think that it is cheaper to shop in{Redditch town {centre.}The area around the shops is not attractive; often it is littered with paper. The pond in front of the shops is dirty and dangerous for young children. A small playarea is provided and there are benches to rest. Many folk would like a bank in the centre.
